SELECT SUBSTRING_INDEX (SUBSTRING_INDEX(Club.club_hashtag,',',numbers.n),',',-1) club_hashtag
FROM (select 1 n union all select 2 union all select 3 union all select 4 union all select 5 union all select 6 union all select 7 union all select 8 union all select 9 union all select 10) numbers INNER JOIN club on CHAR_LENGTH ( Club.club_hashtag ) - CHAR_LENGTH ( REPLACE ( Club.club_hashtag , ',' , '' ))>= numbers . n-1 WHERE SUBSTRING_INDEX ( SUBSTRING_INDEX ( Club.club_hashtag , ' ' , numbers . n ), ' ' , -1 ) != ' ' AND club_num=35
